marklogic.body:
When I first left home my mum told me that if I knew Judo I’d be able to defend myself from muggers.
Typically, I ignored her advice and never attended a single Judo lesson.
THEN one night someone tried to snatch my handbag in the street. In blind panic I screamed at him, ‘I KNOW JUDO!’ and to my absolute amazement, the idiot ran Off!
So although I might know more about Cluedo than Judo, my mum was Spot on!
Thanks!
Gemma Moorcroft (jim.gatts@hotmail.co.uk)
